messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=37d4691df584 ***

See also https://codereview.appspot.com/7520044

> *** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=37d4691df584 ***

I thought I killed that one already. Well spotted.

-rob
